data.post_excerpt: This Liquid Cleanser is a great for removing makeup, including tough to remove waterproof makeup. It removes both water and oil based pigments, and leaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed
data.formula_description: This Liquid Cleanser is a great for removing makeup, including tough to remove waterproof makeup. It removes both water and oil based pigments, and leaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed. The Liquid Cleanser prepares skin for a natural look or full glam!

data.post_excerpt: Mid-day slump have you feeling dehydrated? Filter-Free Mist gives just the moisturizing boost needed. The gel-to-mist technology will allow the skin to hydrate quickly during the driest afternoon hours
data.formula_description: Mid-day slump have you feeling dehydrated? Filter-Free Mist gives just the moisturizing boost needed. The gel-to-mist technology will allow the skin to hydrate quickly during the driest afternoon hours. A quick mist helps to regulate sebum production while maintaining moisturization. Spray, and take your look through the evening.

Just spray, blend, and take on the day!

data.formula_description: Brighten your day with a double dose of Gellee! Experience the power of the skin brightening actives wrapped in a luxurious gel. process_steps.p_description: Combine Phase A in main beaker and mix with propeller agitation.
Combine Phase B in side beaker and mix well until all powder is wet out.
Add Phase B to main beaker and propeller mix until uniform. Switch to sweep mixing once viscosity builds.
Add Phase C to main beaker and sweep mix until uniform.
Add Phase D to main beaker and sweep mix until uniform.
Combine Phase E and add to batch. Sweep mix until uniform.

data.formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

product_concept_description: LinoRet-AF is a retinol derivative that de-esterifies in the skin to retinol and linoleic acid offering two actives in one. This allows LinoRet-AF to be extremely stable and easier to formulate with. LinoRet-AF offers anti-aging and brightening benefits without the irritation or dehydrating effect of Retinol.

LinoRet-AF is a retinol derivative that de-esterifies in the skin to retinol and linoleic acid offering two actives in one. This allows LinoRet-AF to be extremely stable and easier to formulate with. LinoRet-AF offers anti-aging and brightening benefits without the irritation or dehydrating effect of Retinol.

product_concept_description: Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier. It is comprised mainly of phosphotidylcholine, the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane o f cells located in the epidermis. It is the only emulsifier in the industry tested to have absolutely no irritation. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. In addition to its emulsifying properties, Lecinol S-10 acts as an active ingredient, increasing moisturization and reducing melanin synthesi

Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier. It is comprised mainly of phosphotidylcholine, the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane o f cells located in the epidermis. It is the only emulsifier in the industry tested to have absolutely no irritation. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. In addition to its emulsifying properties, Lecinol S-10 acts as an active ingredient, increasing moisturization and reducing melanin synthesis.

Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier. It is comprised mainly of phosphotidylcholine, the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane o f cells located in the epidermis. It is the only emulsifier in the industry tested to have absolutely no irritation. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. In addition to its emulsifying properties, Lecinol S-10 acts as an active ingredient, increasing moisturization and reducing melanin synthesis.

Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier. It is comprised mainly of phosphotidylcholine, the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane o f cells located in the epidermis. It is the only emulsifier in the industry tested to have absolutely no irritation. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. In addition to its emulsifying properties, Lecinol S-10 acts as an active ingredient, increasing moisturization and reducing melanin synthesis.

product_concept_description: BV-OSC is a highly stable oil soluble Vitamin C. Tested to outperform other forms of Vitamin C for its anti-oxidant and skin penetration effect. It is tested in vivo to reduce skin pigmentation (2-3%) as well as reducing the appearance of age spots. In addition, BV-OSC is tested to increase collagen synthesis and reduce oxidative damage to cells. BV-OSC is a Quasi-Drug active in Japan (3%) and a Functional Ingredient in Korea (2%) for skin whitening.

Mitostime is a concentrated extract of the brown algae, Laminaria digitata. It is tested in vivo to reduce the appearance of aging. Mitostime protects mitochondrial DNA and increases skin oxygenation. As a result, Mitostime helps skin to look and act younger. *An alternate version, Mitostime G, is available upon special request.

*An alternate version, Mitostime G, is available upon special request.

product_concept_description: Fermented lactobacillus, which triggers the synthesis of an anti-microbial peptide called β-defensin 2. This peptide creates holes in the membrane of pathogenic bacteria resulting in reduction of pathogens. BioFense was tested at 1% and 5% in vivo to reduce acne lesions in 5 days.

[Concept] Fermented lactobacillus, which triggers the synthesis of an anti-microbial peptide called β-defensin 2. This peptide creates holes in the membrane of pathogenic bacteria resulting in reduction of pathogens. BioFense was tested at 1% and 5% in vivo to reduce acne lesions in 5 days.

product_concept_description: Saliporine-8 is a lipophilic extract of Salicornia, a coastal plant. It is tested in vivo (1%) to significantly increase moisturization as a result on increasing the synthesis of Urea in the skin. Saliporine-8 was also tested to reduce the amount of Trans Epidermal Urea Loss (TEUL).

Photosomes-V is a rare, photo-activated enzyme encapsulated in a liposomes. The liposome is designed to break down in cells, releasing the rare enzyme. Photosomes is tested to repair DNA damage induced by UV.

*An alternate version, Photosomes V-PF, is available upon special request.

product_concept_description:
UGL-II PF is a bioengineered complex of Glucosamine HCl, algae extract, yeast and urea. It is tested in vivo to reduce wrinkles by 55% in 3 months. In addition to its wrinkle reducing properties, UGL-II PF increases hydration, skin smoothness and firmness.

*An alternate version, UGL-II NPX, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol, is available upon special request.

product_concept_description: Polyolprepolymers are a patented delivery and deposition technology which holds active ingredients in a reservoir in the upper layers of the skin. This technology optimizes the use of active ingredients as well as preventing irritation from ingredients that typically would penetrate too far into the skin (ex. Salicylic Acid). Polyolprepolymers were also tested to add water resistance to sunscreens (whirlpool study), have outstanding spreading characteristics, enhance antimicrobial activity and much more.

NET WS-CF is a proprietary mixture designed to make water-in- silicone emulsions. These emulsions can have a high water content creating a unique hydrating texture. NET WS-CF is also highly recommended for pigmented emulsions as it evenly disperses pigment on the skin.

product_concept_description: Resurfacid CR is a biomaterial designed to control the release of Alpha Hydroxy Acid. When used, it delivers 0.56% of AHA. However, the pH of use is close to the skin's pH with similar exfoliation results compared to conventional AHA used at 8% or 15%.

data.post_excerpt: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old
product_description: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

formula_description: Seize your ‘dropportunity’! Add a few color drops to transform your favorite skincare product into a pop of color, color it yourself! Find your perfect level of coverage from a sun kissed tint to a flawless look.

Fight signs of aging and pollution! This anti-polluaging formulation glides onto skin effortlessly, delivering moisturization and hydration throughout the stressful city life. It starts as a moisturizing cream that turns into a silky smooth primer that blurs fine lines creating the perfect canvas for your daily makeup regimen for a day in the city!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version and/or Ethoxylate-Free Version.
formula_base: Barcril-AV is a sodium salt of acrylic copolymer, an absorbent powder which holds more than 20 times its dry weight in water. Formulations featuring the Barcril-AV technology release water when applied to the skin and provide a unique change in texture during application while leaving a soft blurred finish.

formula_description: A luxurious silicone gel formula that breaks upon application creating a soothing water sensation that leaves your skin with a radiant glow! Fight inflammation both day and night to calm skin for an even skin tone.

Bring your mascara back to life! This mascara refresher is perfect for a quick touch-up designed to instantly revive, separate and define every lash. A serum-like formulation that will help to increase eyelash length and volume with the incorporation of natural source actives. Say goodbye to stiff lashes and refresh your eyes!

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for an Ethoxylate-Free Version.

This weightless Jelly Foundation gives your skin a healthy tinted glow filled with lasting hydration. Create an even complexion, covering imperfections, with this bouncy, spreadable foundation. Jelly Foundation will moisturize your skin all day for a smooth, lasting look.

*Flexible Formula: Love this formula but interested in different ingredients? To alter this formula, please contact barnetlab@barnetproducts.com for a Silicone-Free Version.

concept_description: HOLOBIONT BEAUTY Description: deposition technology which holds active ingredients

product_concept_description:
UGL-II PF is a bioengineered complex of Glucosamine HCl, algae extract, yeast and urea. It is tested in vivo to reduce wrinkles by 55% in 3 months. In addition to its wrinkle reducing properties, UGL-II PF increases hydration, skin smoothness and firmness.

*An alternate version, UGL-II NPX, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol, is available upon special request.

Photosomes-V is a rare, photo-activated enzyme encapsulated in a liposomes. The liposome is designed to break down in cells, releasing the rare enzyme. Photosomes is tested to repair DNA damage induced by UV.

*An alternate version, Photosomes V-PF, is available upon special request.
